pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Emitter$() is one of the key parts required for a sculk transporting system. It automatically takes items from the container beneath, converts them into a sculk signal and sends them to any nearby $(item)Sculk Transmitters$() or $(item)Receivers$().

pages.title: Crafting:
pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Emitter$() can be modified with a $(item)Quantity Modifier$() or a $(item)Speed Modifier$().
